description: This file defines an interface IMath within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. The interface declares methods for basic math operations (Add and Sub) that are intended to be implemented by other classes, enabling remote procedure calls (RPC) via COMRPC/JSONRPC. The file includes licensing and licensing information, include guards, and a reference to an external Module.h.

classes.name: IMath
classes.description: An interface defining basic math operations (Add and Sub) for remote invocation, following a COMRPC/JSONRPC pattern.

methods.name: Add
methods.description: Calculates the sum of two unsigned 16-bit integers A and B, outputting the result via the reference parameter 'sum'.

methods.name: Sub
methods.description: Calculates the difference of two unsigned 16-bit integers A and B, outputting the result via the reference parameter 'sum'.

ctags.name: IMath
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IMath : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
